org.presentation.validatorhtml.impl

Class HTMLValidatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.presentation.validatorhtml.impl.HTMLValidatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageProducer, SinglePageControllerService, Option, Stoppable

    @Dependent
public class HTMLValidatorImpl
extends Object
implements SinglePageControllerService
    SinglePageControllerService representing HTML validator service. Sends LinkURL of HTML file to W3C validation service and processes its SOAP response to MessageLogger.
    Author:
    Jindřich Máca
